snippet.title: Sovereign's Enigma - Teaser
snippet.description:
"Sovereign's Enigma" is a upcoming 2D platformer with survival elements, where the player needs to uncover the story of an ancient civilization to solve a mystery from the past. This game is a slow and immersive experience, with a strong focus on storytelling, atmosphere, and characters.

SOCIALS:
- Twitter: https://x.com/huliaw_dev
- Itchio: https://crowempress.itch.io/
